member.name: T:Sgml.UniversalEntityResolver
member.summary: A special implementation of IEntityResolver that uses the UWP Windows.Storage API's for local file access and HttpClient for web content.

member.name: M:Sgml.UniversalEntityResolver.GetContent(System.Uri)
member.summary: Open the given Uri. If the Uri is relative then it could be referring to either a local file or an embedded resource.
member.param: the absolute or relative Uri of the resource to load
member.returns: The stream, or throws exception if the resource is not found
